title: PHParray_fill()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHParray_fill()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Fill an array with values:
<?php
$a1=array_fill(3,4,"blue");
print_r($a1);
?>

Definition and Usage
The array_fill() function fills an array with values.
Syntax
array_fill(
index, number, value
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
index
Required. The first index of the returned array
number
Required. Specifies the number of elements to insert
value
Required. Specifies the value to use for filling the array
Technical Details
Return Value:
Returns the filled array
PHP Version:
4.2+

★
+1
